title: 3BR, 2BA w/ natural light, laundry & parking - Lake Street District
posting_body: Spacious, elegant and naturally well-lit 3BR, 2BA condo in Lake Street District.
Many modern conveniences and amenities included, plus an unbeatable location close to restaurants, grocery stores, MUNI, parks and schools.
Features:
-Large living room with tall windows that let in lots of natural light
-Formal dining room open to the living area for easy entertaining
-Kitchen with refinished cabinetry, spacious granite countertops, gas stove, oven, refrigerator, freezer, and dishwasher
-3 bedrooms: a master suite with large closets and attached bathroom + 1 bedroom with ample closet space + 1 bedroom or office with windows on all 3 sides
-2 bathrooms, oversized main bathroom with deep jetted tub and gorgeous tile work
-Newly painted walls and polished hardwood floors throughout
-This is the lower unit in a 2-unit building
Bonus:
-One parking space in the shared 2-car garage included
-Your own storage room in the garage included
-In-unit laundry (washer & dryer)
-Shared backyard with renovated seating and dining structure, permanent fire pit, and natural gas grill — perfect for entertaining outdoors
Neighborhood:
-Close to major MUNI lines: one block to the 1 and the 28, 5 minute walk to the 38/38R
-5 minute walk to Clement St, with plenty of amazing restaurants, grocery stores, cafes, bakeries, book stores, and clothing shops
-One block from Mountain Lake Park, which has a lake, dog run, playground, tennis courts, garden meadow & picnic areas.
5 min walk to the Presidio and 15 min walk to Golden Gate Park
-Near quality schools, and easy access to libraries, museums, movie theaters and beaches
Terms
- No smoking
- No pets
- Utilities not included
- Unfurnished
- 12 month lease, then month-to-month
- Security deposit (2 months rent)
- Rental application required & must provide credit report, pay stubs and W2s
If interested, please provide your name, email, phone number, and short blurb about yourself in the reply email.
